channel.title: [PI] NPC Default Drops
channel.description: First off i know how the NPCDrops.tsm works, but ive noticed that the monsters drop bones by default, and that is handled in the NPCHandler class, but when dragons drop bones, only my kbd drops anything, including bones, but the other dragons are defined in NPCHandler? How can i fix their Drops?

item.title: [PI] NPC Default Drops
item.dc:creator: @genoarch genoarch
item.description:
@genoarch wrote:

First off i know how the NPCDrops.tsm works, but ive noticed that the monsters drop bones by default, and that is handled in the NPCHandler class, but when dragons drop bones, only my kbd drops anything, including bones, but the other dragons are defined in NPCHandler? How can i fix their Drops?

Read full topic
